Bittercube Bazaar

An eclectic storefront with knowledgeable staff, the Bittercube Bazaar is stocked with new and vintage bar tools, reference books, and a curated selection of our favorite spirits and liqueurs.

In addition, we feature Bittercube Bitters and a rotating selection of seasonal Tailor Made tonics, ginger beers and On the Fly cocktail elixirs.

Mon/Tues

By Appointment, 10AM-6PM

Wed-Sat

2PM-9PM

Featured Special

Ginger Spiced Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters

Limited release Ginger spiced Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters are available.

View Product

Featured Demo

Stir Your Cocktail Like a Pro!

Familiarize yourself with the tools and learn the techniques to properly stir a cocktail in this hands-on demo. As a bonus, learn the golden ratio for and taste a sample of a classic Old Fashioned. Plus, receive 10% of stirring tools and ingredients for your perfect Old Fashioned.

RSVP at Eventbrite

tasting

Facility Tour (aka, So What Are Bitters Anyways?)

Multiple dates available

Price: $14

Location: Bar & Bazaar

This interactive facility tour starts with a welcome drink in the Bazaar. We will go behind the scenes in the production facility, where we will navigate the entire bitters-making process from raw botanicals to bottling. We'll also make a stop at the R&D lab for a taste of something we are currently working on. The tour finishes with a cocktail of your choice from the Bazaar and a bitters demonstration, during which you'll lick and smell your own hands in front of strangers. Trust us, it's cool and not weird at all. All tour guests get 10% off Bittercube products in the Bazaar.

RSVP at Eventbrite
View All Events

Stop By

We are located at 4828 W Lisbson Ave, Milwaukee WI 53210. There is a public parking lot directly across the street from our building and a crosswalk in front of the police station. There is also ample street parking available in the surrounding neighborhood. Please do not park in parking lots of other businesses. Enter through the front door for both the Bittercube Bar & Bazaar. Tell your Uber/Lyft/taxi driver to drop you off right in front of the building!

(414) 367-4477 Directions
